code: import React from'react';import{Box,SvgIcon,Typography}from'@mui/material';import AirIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Air';import FilterDramaIcon from'@mui/icons-material/FilterDrama';import ThermostatIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Thermostat';import{ReactComponent as HumidityIcon}from'../../assets/humidity.svg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WeeklyForecastItem=_ref=>{let{value,type}=_ref;let iconContent;if(type==='temperature')iconContent=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ThermostatIcon,{sx:{fontSize:{xs:'15px',sm:'16px',md:'18px'}}});else if(type==='wind')iconContent=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AirIcon,{sx:{fontSize:{xs:'15px',sm:'16px',md:'18px'}}});else if(type==='clouds')iconContent=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FilterDramaIcon,{sx:{fontSize:{xs:'15px',sm:'16px',md:'18px'}}});else if(type==='humidity')iconContent=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SvgIcon,{component:HumidityIcon,inheritViewBox:true,sx:{fontSize:{xs:'15px',sm:'16px',md:'18px'}}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center',height:'31px',color:'rgba(255, 255, 255, .7)',gap:{xs:'3px',sm:'4px',md:'6px'},width:'100%'},children:[iconContent,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"p",component:"p",sx:{fontSize:{xs:'12px',sm:'13px'},fontWeight:{xs:'400',sm:'600'},color:'white',fontFamily:'Poppins',lineHeight:1},children:value})]});};export default WeeklyForecastItem;
